content.detailedDescription:
Actually reporting this from a description my brother gave me. what makes this more credible is that he is a ufo "non-believer" and is not much of an internet user, so he hasn't had exposure to what may be posted by others. he called me on the morning of march 6 to talk about another issue, and near the end of the conversation said, "oh, by the way, i saw the strangest thing last night while driving up my road." he came to a stop sign and happened to glance through the top part of his windshield just in time to see what he first thought was a shooting star. he then realized it was not a meteor and told me he still wasn't sure what it was. i asked him to describe it and when he said "triangle shaped," it got my attention quickly. he said it was moving extremely fast, much faster than anything he had ever seen before, and covered the sky in 2 or 3 seconds. it made no sound and traveled in an arching motion like it was following the curve of the earth. he estimated that it was at least 10,000 feet up, maybe more. he also said it had to be quite large due to the altitude and relative size when compared to the stars. it was traveling from north to south towards tarentum/harmarville area. i asked him if he could sketch it and he said he could. he described the huge light on the bottom of the craft, and the outside edges were lit along the entire length, and several large lights in the back. the lights seemed blurry/hazy, and left sort of a streak, but he figured it was due to the extreme speed. i went to his house the following weekend and brought along several print-outs of triangle craft since he had never seen a photo of one before. he was amazed to see how close his drawing was to others. to this day, he said he still doesn't believe in ufos, but he is sure that what he saw was not any type of known airplane or military jet.

i re-sketched the craft based on his drawing, which was on a torn out line piece of paper, so i figured it would scan clearer if i re-did it. the main difference to note on this craft is the lack of lights at each point. all of the lights were white and had no blinkers. i am hoping someone else out there has witnessed this type of craft, especially the extreme speed. he told me that if he didn't happen to glance up at just the right moment, he would have never seen it.
content.summary: High speed triangle craft

content.detailedDescription: i often glance up at the sky for a few moments when heading to the car or coming in, especially at night. i was headed to the store about 10:30pm and before getting into the car i just happened to catch sight of a grayish mass low over the trees headed south to north. i couldn't really make out a distinct shape. just a grayish mass moving about 40 mph. no lights or sound. the first thing that crossed my mind was a small aircraft but i quickly dismissed that idea since there was no sound or lights. even though the first impression was of a single object, i wondered if it might have been a tight flock of light colored birds although i couldn't see any individual birds but i was mostly just trying to think of something that might make more sense. the object appeared to be about a block away and was about three times as long as it was thick. if the estimate on distance is correct, the object would have been 25-30 feet long.I watched the object for 5 or 6 seconds and lost sight of it due to the glare of a much closer streetlight. i continues scanning the sky for a few more minutes but nothing else unusual was seen.
content.summary: Grayish mass low over trees heading south to north.

content.detailedDescription:
This was about 9 o'clock at night easter time. i was getting out of the car with my fiance and 2 friends. i have been seeing triangle formations in the skay alot lately so i took a look into the sky. i saw two lights and instantly a 3red apeared and formed a triangle formation. my friend alex instantly noticed this as well. we call over our girlfriends and skepticly watched the light formation change colors, starting red and and light yellow and also included blue and green. they stood out from other stars because of the size. also each dot changed to different color sometimes being the same and sometimes not. these swayed slightly but not at a rapid point. a single dot was seen but alex's girlfriend stacy, off to the left a good was and was even bigger. this dot changed from red to yellow multiple times and happened slowly. this one moved around in all dirrections at different speeds. we all went in to get my fiances camera and apon getting to the top stairs i looked out the interior of the window facing all of this and everthing was gone. i reterned out side with the camera and did come across the single light but it was smaller and further behind the tree line. i couldnt get a clear shot. and an audio recording only picked up frantic animals which only happend mid way through viewing the light. and i mean real distress and warning calls.
since this wasnt the fist time im going to try to get better footage tonight.
content.summary: A triangle formation in the sky changing color then the apearence of a single one of to the left . the triangle formation of lights disapeared and the single light  fluttered out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
When:   i'm not sure the of the exact date, but it was late feb (27th?)/early march on a saturday night at around 10pm.

where: on the beach along the grand strand of south carolina, usa (a stretch of beach that runs from georgetown to myrtle beach). i would prefer not to give my exact location.

who: me, alone

weather: mostly clear...Maybe a few wisps of clouds that you could see stars through. cold. no real wind to speak of. quiet. ocean calm. it was not very high tide, but mid or low - i don't remember exactly.

what: i was standing on a beach crosswalk (over a dune) looking east across the beach toward the ocean. i often go out at night for a moment of quiet before going to bed. i looked south down the beach and noticed three larger sized glowing white lights. one of them  was about 45degrees up from the horizon just over the surf. another was the same height, but further west (more directly south of me), and the final one was the same height and much further west ... i looked a bit back over the dune to see it.  if i stretched my arm out to the fullest, they were about the size of my fingertip.

they caught my attention because they were still. they didn't move in the sky at all. they did fluoresce somewhat, and i did not think that it was an atmospheric effect. it was more like they were 'shining'. 

at first i thought they were flares, but they were so high up and, as i watched, they did not fade. i continued to watch and almost began to feel that they were watching back, even acknowledging me (i know that sounds strange!). i must've been out there more than 5 minutes watching, until i went back inside. it was cold. 

it occurred to me that they might be alien, which i thought was ridiculous. since shaw air force base is a little over two hours away in sumter, sc, i thought it was more likely was something they were doing. i did not return with a camera because i thought i had an explanation (rationalization?). 

why am i changing my mind now? i just found this mufon and the ufo casebook websites today. these two pictures seem very much like what i saw. it made me wonder:

http://www.Ufocasebook.Com/2010/moscow011610.Html
http://www.Ufocasebook.Com/2010/norfolkuk061509.Html

sounds/smells/electromagnetic feelings: nothing unusual.

missing time? no

other objects? this is a flightpath for commercial airlines. they usually fly quite high in the sky. i did see a few jet lights passing far up overhead. these unusual lights stood out because they seemed a bit closer and did not move.
content.summary: Three flourescing cream-white lights standing still in the sky over head, over the beach, for longer than 5 minutes. no sound. no movement.

content.detailedDescription: On june 2, 2009 i witnessed the most unbelievable object i have ever seen.  i was sitting on my balcony and when i looked up i saw a giant egg in the sky.   as i watched this egg it shimmered from white to silver.  the next thing i saw was absolutely amazing.   the egg began to crack open.  from inside a giant chicken appeared.  the giant chicken flew around using his wings.   the chicken then flew to the ground.   this chicken then spoke to me.   i asked him the only question i could think of.  i said "please tell me great chicken,  what came first, the chicken or the egg."   the giant alien chicken responded, " my daughter,  free the imprisoned chickens from the earth."   i then realized the master race of all humanity was the chicken.  it is now my life duty to free all the chickens from the cannibalistic humans.  the chicken then answered my question.  he said all chickens and all life comes from bacteria and all the aliens exist in peoples brains.
content.summary: A giant egg

content.detailedDescription:
As i headed to the house from the garage i could not help but notice this huge, bright light sitting above the top of the mountain. i stopped for a few seconds to see if it was moving, as i know that planes sometimes approach dulles from this direction, and it was stationary and silent. i looked around my immediate area to note my exact spot and than ran inside to get others, returning right away, 10 seconds at best with my friends wife, i noted that it was slowly moving, i relocated with her and we watched it sit in the sky motionless, for some time. we both said "that's no star" "it's too big""its too close". after 5 minutes or so she went back inside and i continued to watch as it would slowly move requiring me to relocate again due to the trees.At times it looked as if planes were circling it. i marked the driveway and needing to pinpoint its spot and judge speed i moved again until it was exactly above a telephone pole. after a few more minutes it descended behind the other side of the mountain, i watched it pass behind the trees at the top and it was gone. later that night i was awakened by an explosion type noise, i went outside and heard 2 more, which sounded more like sonic booms, all three sounds happened in less than one minute.This is not the first time i have seen really bright lights in the area, however its the first time i watched one so close, 2 miles away at best, a mile to the mountain and about 2,000 feet above us.It's location was on the virginia, west virginia line exactly, and went down on the west virginia side.I have heard sonic booms before and these were no doubt sonic booms.It did not appear any different through binoculars.

as soon as i returned home to md. i filed this report.
content.summary: Brighter,bigger, and way  too close to be a star, later 3 sonic booms

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back yard watching the heat lightening. staring up at the sky, in the distance, i noticed 7 non-flashing, star like, lights moving forward in at separated cluster. cynical, i kept watching. the cluster of lights rearranged, shot backwards and then completely disappeared from the sky. i immediately ran inside, locked the doors and closed the blinds.
content.summary: Moving cluster of lights in sky, shot backwards, disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
First spotted and photographed in november 2008 above my house in reading, pa

spotted sporadically throughout 2009.

since march 2010 it appears every night around 8:20pm and is usually gone in an hour.

don't even try telling me this is venus as you did with so many others.
content.summary: Started sporadically in november 2008. in 2010 we see it nightly for about 45 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I watched the late new's and saw the weather report 5-3-10 , the following day was going to be windy, i had to go outside to move my bonsai tree's to a location that they wouldnt be damaged by tommorrow's wind. when i went outside to do so, just before 11pm i looked up at the night sky and noticed an object to the west of my house hovering and changing color , i thought it strange and thought i would run inside my house and grab my camera with my long 400mm-800mm len's and my tripod to view this object better. i ran back outside and set up my camera, the object remained in the same place for some 7-8 minutes without any movement or sound. i took 1 photo of it in this position( see photo titled ufo photo #1 )., then the object seemed to rotate around , as if it were going to move in another direction, i took 1 more photo ( see photo titled: ufo turned #2 )  , as i backed off my camera len's to get a longer/wider view,  the object took off south in direction at an alarming speed, i managed to snap the last photo as it left ( see photo titled: ufo leaving ) these photo's were long exposure's because of the low light condition's which saturated the colors more than normal , but they are suprisingly clear , and you can see distant star's in the background's with no motion blur. i live 8 mile's from a air force military instalation, so this object could be a black op's project , but from the photo's and the speed involved in my sighting i can easily say , it is like nothing ive ever seen..Really a strange night, but also exhilerating.
content.summary: Odd shape, hovering and high speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside and a sonic fast ufo was above me (this was between blinks)it shot a beam of light at me and it knocked me out for exactly 5 minutes
content.summary: Bright light entitys moving about the craft

content.detailedDescription: Looking out into the ocean i notice to my left a flying object... it was almost a humming sound but very quiet almost as if it didnt exsist. it flew over me similiar in size to a commuter smaller wing span. its was like a flying v... it then appeared to submerge in the ocean in the far horizon or it took off into space and its path appeared curved due to it leaving the atmosphere. truley amazing i believe either in the technology or extra-terrestrial life sorry took so long to report i have been increasdingly involved in the history channel programs...  acient aliens etc... i thank you for reading this if you do
content.summary: Late at night on my balcony its been 4 years but it was silent and had 5 vibrant lights underneath it.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home at 10:25pm heading south on 9th avenue in boca raton.  i saw hundreds of cars lining the streets including csi, boca police and k-9 units.  the police set up a telescope.  i asked what the commotion was about, and onlookers pointed to the object... the glaringly white (blinking red, green and blue) object, moving erratically upways, and downways and east and west.  it was oval-shaped (length east/west direction).  i knew right away that it was a ufo.  i had always been somewhat of a believer, although i had never encountered a ufo.  my entire body shook and my eyes teared up the moment i saw the object.  i continued to shake and my eyes continued to tear for the next two hours.  it appeared about 20 times larger, if not more, than polaris (north star).  onlookers said it had been directly overhead where they laid on their backs on the grass to watch it until it shot north.  onlookers mentioned that it made triangular turns in its motions, it spun on it's axis.  on onlooker mentioned that his house beamed red from inside at around 11:00pm as if he was in the path of a red beamed light.  several others mentioned that it appeared to be beaming a light downward.  one of the onlookers was on the phone with his sister in orlando (a 3 to 3.5 hour drive away), and she was informing him of a sighting there.  they were describing the object's movements to one another verbatim.  they determined that they were looking at the same object.  two different onlookers at separate locations mentioned a "red squiggly thing" shooting out.  the police on the telescope mentioned to an onlooker that the object was dome-shaped on top, flat on the bottom with several circular lights on the underneath side.  we watched the object as it hung overhead very still while flashing different colors.  at the time, all of the stars that we could see were flashing the same colors as the object.  the stars weren't shining normally like they usually so when the light they gives off passes through the layers of the atmosphere.  it was a different type of shine--flashes of red, yellow and green.  there were planes and helicopters chasing it and it continued to move more west.  it finally dropped in the sky below the trees we were near, and we lost track of it.  we drove around for about one hour until 11:30ish and never caught sight of it again.  we drove to a parking lot where we could almost see the horizon, and we still could not see it.  when i returned home, my dog, who  had been in her crate, refused to come out (she's normally very cheerful and greets us with licks and jumps when we arrive home.)  she then started shaking and pawing like crazy at the door.  she appeared as if she couldn't get outside fast enough.  her actions showed us that she needed to go to the bathroom.  but that wasn't the case.  she ran outside and sniffed for several minutes.  the next morning, we saw the story on several different news stations.  they all stated that it was a kite with an led bike light.  there are no pictures of the kite with the bike light.  there is no way that a kite could have been maintained that high in the sky by a person, and the alleged bike light was much too bright to be a real led light.  i am officially a true believer.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Fast moving to the west, made erratic movements int he sky, blinking red, blue, green and white

content.detailedDescription:
We had a power outage last night for about 6 hours.I was checking for lights at neighbors(looking west)when a huge starlike object stood out coming from the west to east,higher than i imagined aircraft to fly.No flashing lights.The speed is what awestruck me.I go to the opposite side of house to continue to watch,and it just vanished!
within minutes i am looking out the same window facing west and a duplicate (star)(ball)(lite)is once again coming from the west toward the east,except a few miles apart,(first one was southmost,and the second was north most,both heading east.Again i follow the huge light,and it disappears right in front of my eyes!
again,i guess the speeds of these objects were way faster than any jet or anything.2nd sighting(s) in a little over 6 mths.Thanx
content.summary: Too fast for airplane!

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of may 4th 2010 myself my daughter and my daughter viewed multiple rotating green and white and blue some blinked in and out of our sight range others appeared as mili second bright streaks that blinked out as quickly as they blinked in they were basically were streaking as they blinked in and out.
some of the lights were in the vicinity of ellington air force base but they seemed to be swarming without an ordered flight direction.
we watched them for about 20 minutes but we had to leave to get my daughter ready for school they were still swarming when we left.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On the morning of may 4th between 5:35 & 5:55 myself and two others witness multiple ufos.

content.detailedDescription: I had a really bad breakup with my boyfriend a few months back and decided to clear my mind.  i grabbed a chair and sat on the balcony. the day was beautiful. there was not a cloud in the sky, and it was broad daylight.  i was looking at the sky as i always do when i reflect.  it makes me feel closer to god and i talk to him when i look at the sky.  as i was looking, there was an huge object that was shining brighter than the moon would had it been out, and the light seemed to constantly change shape.  it was the kind of glare like the sun, except it didn't hurt my eyes to look. i immediately knew what it was.  there was no question.  i ran in a got a family member who was napping at the time so that she could view it. we watched it on and off for about an hour before i tried to take pictures of it on my camera phone but it would not show up.  after a couple of hours the sky got much darker and you could see it even clearer. by this time there were two more smaller crafts that had been released, one to the left and one to the right.  they were blinking in a pattern unlike anything that i can describe.  almost like they were communicating with the bright craft. the craft was so bright that i could not tell it's shape.  a little while after that, it moved. at first it was directly up and slightly to the left in the sky.  then it appeared much lower farther right.  the smaller crafts were going in circles in their positions. when i came back to check again, they all had gone.  i never felt scared.  i was smiling and excited.  as strange as this is about to sound, i was trying to see if i could communicate mentally with it.  i asked it to change it's colors but it never did.  it remained so bright, the light almost looked yellowish. i started to get in my car and drive nearer to it but i did not want to miss much.  god is amazing!  truly fascinating this was.
content.summary: Craft releasing other crafts to survey area

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 845 last night i was taking a walk with my friend. we were looking and the sky and saw a very bright light, assumed it to be a planet. we got back to our apartments and looked at the "star" again. as soon as we commented how bright it was it faded away. it then dimmed back on. it was so bright, too bright to be a planet we thought, it was white light like a star/plane light. we decided to sit down and watch it. it appeared to stay stationary but we were not observing close enough to see if it was moving. we later thought it would have moved lower in the night sky if it was moving (slowly!) finally after about 15 minutes if faded away again! we sat for about 5 more minutes but it never came back.

i enjoyed watching it! i'm curious to what it is.
content.summary: Very bright white light in sky fades and reappears, until it finally disappears for good.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on my couch watching t.V. with my living room curtains open when i glanced out side and looked toward the sky.  i saw a bright light that didn't appear to be moving, so i called my friend theresa (who is also my neighbor across the hall) and asked her to take a look at the object.  we both went outside and got some binoculars to try a see what it could be.  it was higher than one of the tall trees in the area, but did not appear to be moving at all.  through the binoculars we could see several small lights within a circle.  at times, even with the naked eye, we noticed what appeared to be a blackish like orb around the bright circle. it stayed in the same place for about 45 minutes then slowly (very slowly) started descending down slightly and across towards the right of where it had been.  after about 15 minutes it started moving back towards the left and appeared to be moving further away. it is now 12:25am and we can still see it in the sky but it is getter quite a bit lower.
content.summary: Several bright lights within a circle shape, at times a blackish orb appeared around it

content.detailedDescription: went outside around 10:25pm to smoke a cigarete i was standing on back deck which faces south, object appeared in night sky heading in a north west direction.  six iridescent white round lights on each side in a large v shape was not low in sky.  no sound, movement was very smooth almost like gliding.  sky was overcast, not alot of moonlight.  object did not put off light, formation never changed, direction never changed it did not accend or decend in the sky. lost sight of object when it passed over neighbors roof line and my view was blocked .  i want to know what this was. i have no explaination of what this could have been, i cannot explain it away as being an airplane, helicopter, wheather balloon or flairs.  i want to know if anyone else saw this or reported it to the airport, police ect.  i have lived in this area my entire life and never seen anything like this.
content.summary: V shaped iridescent lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home at about 4:30 a.M. driving through hell, michigan coming up to the hell party store. in the corner of my eye i saw a redish orange ball streaking acrossed the sky at a downward angle heading towards the west. my radio was on and my windows were up so i couldnt hear any sounds coming from the 'object'. the ball of lights disappeared behind the trees and i did not see anymore of them after that. the whole thing lasted only around 10 seconds. i only saw the only ball that was red and orange in color. 
after seeing the ball of colors i felt boggeled. it was weird. i didnt know or couldnt explain what it was that i saw that morning. i immediatley called my girlfriend and explained to the best of my ability what i saw.
content.summary: Red and orange streaking ball

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:40 while sitting outside a white light followed by approx. 7 red lights initially in a straight line moved from the southwest towards northeast in a long gradual curve gradually forming into a v-form much like a geese pattern towards the north over clinch mountain.  then approx. one minute later had completed a turn and was then formed into a diamond shape and were heading back towards the east. we lost sight of the lights due to the tree line. the distance estimate would be 8-10 miles overhead and mph would be around 1000-1500.  because of the lack of sound and mobility of the objects/object it did not fit any type of military or civilian aircraft profile.
content.summary: Bright white light followed by several red lights soundless and changing position.

content.detailedDescription: I had just walked out of my garage whcih faces to the northern sky. i heard a tremendous rumble and quickly started scanning the sky due north i noticed at least a dozen fighter jets in semi formation about the second i realized what i was seeing i noticed a quick moving object moving north to south in and out of the formation it was solid white the planes were flying west to east by northeast. the object was whizzing in and out of the formation it was amazing ~ the roar of the planes was deafening ~ they were flying so low ~ i started screaming for my wife to come and see ~ i guess i wanted to make sure i wasn't crazy ~ i just can't tell you the sound of the planes was so,so loud. we live within 10 miles of the local air guard and mcghee tyson airport ~ so we see smaller commercial jets everyday ~ a few apache copters and one to three fighters and of course the refueling tankers (c130's) all the time. but, nothing like this not even close ~ ever! in my 12 years living here i have never seen anything like this. my wife has lived here for 36 years and never seen anything like this. they were basically encircling the object all the fighters had red lights not flashing or white just red which is not the norm either so it was very easy to see that the object (white) was moving in and around them ~ amazing!! every dog in the neighborhood was going crazy we had line of sight with the planes for about 45 to 60 seconds and only saw the object for about 30 because of the tree line. but there were 3 jets coming up right after they went past flying in a line side by side follwing the circle of planes in front ~ we could hear them for at least 4 minutes after passing thats how loud it was.
content.summary: No less than 12 fighter jets chasing a fast moving object

content.detailedDescription:
Im going to try to discribe 2 of 5 events as best i can starting with the most recent one first.On the early morning of may 3 about 1:15 am on the way back from mexia tx. my wife and her sister saw a bell shaped object with 2 big nonblinking lights one red and one green.The lights were on the bottom portion the object making the bell shape visable.They were heading south on hwy 39 about 1\2 mile away from hwy 164.My wife sister is in the military and estamats it was about 150 meters away from them,and about as high in the air as a water tower. the object was in their estamte about 12' across and not sure about hight but was taller than it was wide.They obreved it for a total of about 10 sec and about 3 sec of flight time.When it flew away it left in a high enough rate of speed to leave tracer light trail behide it. 

the socond event occurred on the night of march 9 2010 the day my second son was born.About 4:00am with 20 min before we could head to the hospital me and my wife on our porch in the west part of the sky witnessed an object fly in mutiple patterns in the sky.We watched it for a total of 20 mins it never left we had to leave so we are not for sure how long it was in the sky.It was flying in zig zags, triangles, hovering for mins at a time traveling 50 to 100 miles north back to south,up,down,shapes in not seconds but less less tan 1.It had no discernable flight pattern nor traveled in any one direction.The object looked at first glance looked like a big star yellow tint no flashing at all.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Spinning object with red green lights.Dome shape the moon was the only star in sky to compare size

content.detailedDescription: Heard a loud noise.  looked out window and saw circular shaped object with three very bright lights underneath the craft.  the craft was flying at high speed in a westerly direction over a field.  this craft was not an airplane.  i have been seeing different crafts since i was in 8th grade.
content.summary: Low flying circular object with (3) white lights flying very fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was meeting my girlfriend for late dinner at outback steak house. location was east side of i-35 at the ankeny exit,  i watched this very bright star. it seem too bright and not normal, i watched til i reached outback.  my girlfriend was waiting( already in parking lot) i pulled in so i was facing east and parked.  i got out of the jeep and watched  this light slowly to the south.   this was low on the horizon.    i watch for like three minutes, then had a nice date. she thinks im crazy but i know the truth.   thanks for your time.
                                       matt
content.summary: Very bright star

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i and 9 yr old son were turning in for the night when i happen to notice a rather bright light going across the sky,i saw this as i passed a window on the way to my room. i thought i knew what it could be from the other reports i've read here so we all run out side,clear starlit night,venus was shining good and bright and thing was just as bright and a tad smaller. just a white light going from west to east no plane lights anyhting resembling a plane. while watching it go across the sky the thing got brighter to the point where it looked like stars in painting with points anyway it got really bright for a sec then went back as before.We watched for a total of a min then it was out of view.There were planes in the area higher up than this thing and you could see their lights. this is like the 10th u.F.O.I've seen in last two years. it's only going to get stranger i can feel it!
content.summary: Starlike object lights up

content.detailedDescription: Outside at about 0230, heavy low cloud cover, observed several bright flashes of light 2 min. total duration, no audible noise. did not appear to be lightning heard no thunder. animals in area were aroused unlike lightning.
content.summary: Several bright flashes of light

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving to work and out of the left side of the front window a green glow shot upwards across the sky and ubruptly stopped to the right of us. my daughter and i both at the same time said what the hell was that. we turned to the left and on the right side out the window was a diamond shapped object that was rotating counter clockwise with a white light that you could see moving. it was no plane or copter because there was only the one light and it would move up and down in front of us at a slow rate and would just hover there. the object followed us to the kroger parking lot where we encountered 2 other coworkers that watched with us as it would move up and down and back and forth hovering. when we all got out of our cars to observe it closer there was no sound. there were no stars in the sky so it wasn't a star. we live close to the jackson airport which my daughter has to drive by on her way back home and when she was close to the airport the green light shot across the sky again and seemed to be following her. when she made it home and got out of the car the object was hovering above the neighbors treeline and just kept going up and sown very slowly. are we crazy? all the years i have been driving this route to work in the morning this is the first time this has happened.

when we first saw the object we thought of a shooting star but this seemed to go upwards not down and then abruptly stopped with a white light.

curioustiy was the main thing we were thinking, then a little shaken at the object seeming to be following us.

my daughter went in the house and shut the door.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: A green glow of light shot across the sky upwards and then abrupltly stopped to the right of us!

content.detailedDescription: I worked at a tire store when i was a teenager across the street from my house. me and my boss would work till 9:00 pm on fridays. i just had told my boss goodbye when i stepped out of the building it felt like something was above me so i looked up to see a flyin saucer huvering right abovr me. i screamed for my boss as loud as i possibly can but i could bearly here myself. i watched it for a good 10 minuets or so . it made no noise at all. it had different coulerd lights around it that were very bright. the craft loked very smooth. i wathched it as it slowly moved in a northern direction and then it huverd over a place we call iron hill possibly a 1/4 mile from my house. it zoomed off into space at such a high rate of speed it was unbeilevable. i then screamed for my boss again and this time he came runnin.Of course it was out of sight by then. i then ran home and told my family what i had seen. my uncle was there also selling mason shoes to my father. all i could say was over and over was that i had just seen a ufo. my little sister said she was looking out her bedroom window and seen iy also. i am 50 years old now and of course iv,e told my story to other people some who believe me and some who don,t. a few years ago i went to a radio station in atlanta and told my story. i told the station yo get a lie detector person to come and check my story. two people flew all the way from philly pa. to test me. she interagated me as a criminal not someone who only had seen a ufo. she told them i was lying wiyhout showing the tape and abruptly left. government ? after i had left the radio host called me a day or so later and said he beleived me that i would not have went threw all that trouble to tell a lie. i now it was a flyin saucer, i,m not stupid. i am a father of two , have been married 15 years , am a leading superviser in a major construction company and i am not a lyer. i see all theese shows of people seeing lighs but i seen a real ship. please , i wish for an official credited lie detecter test or to be hipnotised to show the truth. i know what i saw.!!!!!!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: It huverd above me only a couple of hundred feet i new it was a flyin saucer, a real ufo!

content.detailedDescription:
I know this was a long time ago but i have never forgotten it.  i was sitting on a friends outdoor porch with a few others and i was looking up as it was a beautiful clear night and i could see many stars. i noticed very high up in the atmosphere an object moving in a straight line. this i assumed to be a satellite as i had seen them before - so i told a friend next to me. then, the object took a sharp 90 degree turn! i can't remember if the person next to me saw that!  so, i didn't think that satellites make 90 degree turns, do they??? anyway, it was kind of neat.

back in 1968 in mississauga ontario, my grandfather was walking the family dog at around 7 or 8 pm. he said all of a sudden he noticed a light in the sky which appeared unusual as it was "incandescent" looking. it was stationary. he stood looking at it for a short while when all of a sudden it took off very quickly. he was always a logical person and was an agnostic. but he thought this notable so he told me even though i was a young kid at that point (about 13 or 14).

i had very unusual experiences as a child which are not related to these others sightings. i believe that they may have been abductions but i am not one to claim anything. these experiences can be described if you are interested.

debra
content.summary: Sitting with friends on their outdoor porch looking at stars

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting working on my computer when i noticed a very bright flash of light moving left to right across my site out my window.  it did not light up the sky, but rather it looked like the brightest star ever moving across from left to right.  about 30 minutes later i heard helicopters or airplanes in the air around here which is pretty unusual.
content.summary: Very very bright star -- like a meteor but moving left to right very slowly
